meta.description: Minimize the total delivery cost for visiting each city exactly once and returning to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: The cities that need to be visited.

params.name: cost
params.description: The delivery cost between each pair of cities.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a route between two cities is used.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES)

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_Alpha
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Alpha'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'Alpha')
constraints.description: Ensure Alpha is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_Bravo
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Bravo'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'Bravo')
constraints.description: Ensure Bravo is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_Charlie
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Charlie'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'Charlie')
constraints.description: Ensure Charlie is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_Delta
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Delta'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'Delta')
constraints.description: Ensure Delta is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_Alpha
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Alpha'] for i in CITIES if i != 'Alpha')
constraints.description: Ensure exactly one route leaves Alpha.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_Bravo
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Bravo'] for i in CITIES if i != 'Bravo')
constraints.description: Ensure exactly one route leaves Bravo.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_Charlie
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Charlie'] for i in CITIES if i != 'Charlie')
constraints.description: Ensure exactly one route leaves Charlie.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_Delta
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Delta'] for i in CITIES if i != 'Delta')
constraints.description: Ensure exactly one route leaves Delta.
